About

I graduated with bachelors degree in Computer Science and Engineering with a first class distinction in 2015 from India. I worked for 1 year as a technical pre-sales consultant at TIBCO Softwares. It was really fun working at TIBCO Softwares. My job duties included creating proof-of-concept demos using TIBCO’s proprietary softwares for the sales team to address the client’s business problems.

After working for a year, in 2016, I moved to Australia to pursue a Masters degree in Information Technology with a major in Software Engineering. I graduated with a high distinction and a grade point average of 3.5. My favorite subjects were Object Oriented Design, Data Communications and Security, Cloud Computing.

After completing my Masters in 2018, I worked for Bulletproof Networks as a Junior Cloud Architect for 4 months before joining Deloitte as a Cloud Consultant. My day to day tasks include automating the deployment process using CI/CD pipelines, research and development of new and efficient procedures to achieve the desired state of architecture, writing python scripts to automate operations.
